name: Personas & Storyboarding
descr: Investigating how users interact with communal kitchen stoves as an exercise into developing personas and storyboards.

name: Delight Dating App
descr: Designing a mobile dating app for more serious relationships, so you only talk to one person at a time.

name: Hiking To-Do List
descr: Developing a site that has hikes nearby Brown's campus that users can use to track their hiking bucket list!

name: Hack @ Home
descr: Creating a 3D 'home' that hosted a virtual hackathon in 2020 over the Covid-19 pandemic. There is a regular 2D version that was the basis for this version.
